## Description {#details}

This class is a simple list of T structures.

It keeps elements as pre-allocated groups to save memory for each element&#39;s next pointer. It allocates internal data using specified per-thread <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a>. Method <a href="#a3055e7b57c17c6988622279667b77088">add()</a> can be called asynchronously.

Definition at line 23 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/arraylist-h">ArrayList.h</a>.
